text: Kees Driehuis (8 December 1951 â€“ 29 October 2019) was a Dutch television presenter. He was born in Amsterdam. He was best known as the presenter for the television quiz show Per Seconde Wijzer for 29 years. In total he presented 794 episodes of the quiz show. Driehuis died on 29 October 2019 in Amsterdam of bladder cancer at the age of 67. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from bladder cancer Category:Dutch television presenters Category:People from Amsterdam
title: Kees Driehuis
